mdRecord.dcterms:title: Timeline of Your Support for West Virginia Businesses and Communities Memorandum
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The "Timeline of Your Support for West Virginia Business and Communities" memorandum provides a comprehensive overview of Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller's work in the areas of economic development and job creation during his time as governor of West Virginia and as a U.S. senator.
